description:
YouTube is here to stay! There are hundreds of thousands of searches per month of people looking to understand YouTube and grow there online brand

1. YouTube is Now Complex. No longer is it as easy as creating a video and uploading. YouTube is a social media community. There is YouTube video seo. Keyword analysis and analytics. Annotations and editing. Promoted videos and Partners, etc....

2. YouTube is Always Changing. YouTube evolves rapidly. A course designed 1 year ago is no longer valid. You need to keep up with the latest trends to stay ahead of the competition
title: Fully Customise & Run Your YouTube Channel Like A Pro
